title: Freljord unclarified Lore Questions collected
body:
1. Does Lissandra still control dark ice or only true ice? 
2. Did it hurt her sacrificing her sisters?
3. Where did she get her power to seal the watchers?
4.Are they angry at her?
5. Are Ashe and Sejuani Iceborn? Or only descendants? 
6. Who made Sigvad Iceborn? He wasnt there when the watchers were fought? 
7. Are some watchers left in the void?
8. what happened to the frozen watchers?
9. What does Lissandra want from willump?
(A:Willump and Nunu can repair the melting seal with their crystal that creates/repairs true ice)
10. The frostguard call Lissandra lady of darkness, do they know her true form? 
Additions:
11. Are most people on freljord Iceborn now? Or just the frostguard?
12. Can Lissandra make people Iceborn?
13. Why did Liss have to kill her sisters to seal the watchers?

EDIT: A Rioter(Odin) has answered most questions on page 2! 
Feel free to clarify any question by marking the Answer with numbers or tell me to add new ones.

11 No

12 This will be reveal in longer form of media.

Mostly answered or implied by the stories:
1. Dark Ice.
2. Yes. (she still has nightmares because of it)
3. From the Watchers themselves. (her story)
4. The Watchers can't feel "anger" as humans do. (Vel'koz's story)
5. "Iceborn" _refers to_ the descendants; they're not separate terms. (both her and Sigvar's story)
6. ^
7. Yes, it explicitly states so in Vel'koz's story. 
8. That's been retconned into the name of the things trapped under the ice. 
9. You have.
10. It's likely referring to the fact she's blind. 
11. Probably most, since they pick from among children of different tribes for the Frostguard, but only those who survive training actually become Frostguard. 
12. See 5, again. 
13. Obviously as part of whatever magic she used.
